fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to poison each night. They will not know they have been poisoned. The next night, they will be dealt an Unstoppable attack. If they die, their role and will will be displayed as "Cleaned", and their method of death will be hidden.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are immune to any form of delayed attacks.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Murder murder murder MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER MURDER
